install.name: Springboard Video Player
install.author: Tony Wu
install.description: This module allows the displaying of a Springboard video

param.name: cms_domain
param.label: Springboard CMS Domain
param.description: Domain to the Springboard CMS where XML feeds can be retrieved

param.name: player_width
param.label: Width
param.description: Enter the Springboard Video Player Width

param.name: player_height
param.label: Height
param.description: Enter the Springboard Video Player Height

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time in seconds before the module is re-cached.
